author: dennisl
msg: [MCHECKSTYLE-45] It should be possible to configure checkstyle:check to fail on "warnings".
o I renamed the new parameter and method.

author: rdonkin
msg: Added answer to question about KEYS file and policy.

author: tabish
msg: Adding in support in the connector to issue a message pull command for the case where prefetch size is set to zero.
Stomp does not support this so an UnsupportedOperation is thrown is called, the caller is expected to call the isMessagePullSupported first to make sure it is safe.

o add checkMissingArtifactsInReactor() to check if missing artifacts are in reactor
